table.name: vtiger_bhscallcenterreport
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallcenterreport` ( `bhscallcenterreportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscallcenterreport_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallcenterreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscallcenterreportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallcenterreportcf` ( `bhscallcenterreportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallcenterreportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
